entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
